summary: A Script Dragon plugin that keeps track of your allocated perk points and alters your stats based on the perk category (Magic, Health, Stamina).
descriptionHtml:
A Script Dragon plugin that keeps track of your allocated perk points and alters your stats based on the perk category (Magic, Health, Stamina).

Carryweight is derived from stamina.

In the default configuration it would follow this logic:
- every point into Destruction implies 10 more stat points in Magicka
- every point into Heavy Armor implies 10 more stat points in Health
...

The amount of stat points per perk point is configurable as well as the stat category the perk tree is in. Multiple categories for a tree is of course possible. 

Manual stat distribution is getting ignored after activating this plugin. Though it can be disabled at any time to allow further vanilla point allocation.


INSTALLATION:

Just get Script Dragon here and install it: 

Website: http://alexander.sannybuilder.com/?category=other&altname=skyrim_script_dragon
Direct Link: http://alexander.sannybuilder.com/Files/tes/ScriptDragon_1.4.21.0.zip

After that just copy the autostat.asi and the autostat.ini into your Skyrim or Skyrim root/asi folder.
Works with pre-mod savegames.

SETTINGS

Example:

[magicka]
magicka_base=100
magicka_factor=10
magicka_maximum=999

affects_magicka_alteration=1
affects_magicka_marksman=0
affects_magicka_alchemy=3

Lets say you have 4 perk points into alteration and 2 into alchemy. The Magicka stat would be calculated this way:

affects_magicka_alteration (1) * magicka_factor (10) * perkpoints (4) 
+ affects_magicka_alchemy (3) * magicka_factor (10) * perkpoints (2)
+ magicka_base (100) 
= 40 + 60 + 100 = 200 Magicka

Source: https://gitorious.org/tesv-modifications/tesv-modifications/trees/master/src/AutoStats

NOTE: Works best in conjunction with my reskill mod [url=file.php?id=3665]here[/url]
